languages.text: "Мне? Нет-нет, мы нужны друг другу! Только вместе мы сможем дать бой Расколотому Небу и его посланникам. Сначала снесем Арбитес, а потом полетим к стальной звезде в небе. Там мы сразим ложных властителей и начнем возрождать истинный Империум!"

"Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"
languages.original_text: "Мне? Нет-нет, мы нужны друг другу! Только вместе мы сможем дать бой Расколотому Небу и его посланникам. Сначала снесем Арбитес, а потом полетим к стальной звезде в небе. Там мы сразим ложных властителей и начнем возрождать истинный Империум!"

traits.locale_text: "Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

"Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

"Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

"Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

languages.text: «¿A mí? ¡No, no, nos necesitamos mutuamente! Solo juntos podemos derrotar al Cielo Desgarrado y a sus emisarios. Primero eliminamos al Arbites y después volamos a la estrella de acero en el cielo. ¡Allí, daremos muerte a los falsos gobernantes y comenzará nuestra restauración del verdadero Imperium!».
languages.original_text: "Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: «¿A mí? ¡No, no, nos necesitamos mutuamente! Solo juntos podemos derrotar al Cielo Desgarrado y a sus emisarios. Primero eliminamos al Arbites y después volamos a la estrella de acero en el cielo. ¡Allí, daremos muerte a los falsos gobernantes y comenzará nuestra restauración del verdadero Imperium!».

languages.text: “我？不，不是我，是我们！我们需要彼此！只有团结起来，我们才能对抗破碎之空与它的使者。首先，我们会消灭那些法务官，之后飞往天上的钢铁之星。在那里，我们将消灭虚假的统治者，重建真正的帝国！”
languages.original_text: "Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: “我？不，不是我，是我们！我们需要彼此！只有团结起来，我们才能对抗破碎之空与它的使者。首先，我们会消灭那些法务官，之后飞往天上的钢铁之星。在那里，我们将消灭虚假的统治者，重建真正的帝国！”

languages.text: 「俺が？いや、いや、俺たちはお互いを必要としている！一緒にいることで、割れた空やその使者に挑戦できる。まず、裁定局をつまみ出し、それから空にある鋼の惑星に向かって飛び立つ。そこで、偽物の支配者を倒して真の帝国の回復を始める！」
languages.original_text: "Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺が？いや、いや、俺たちはお互いを必要としている！一緒にいることで、割れた空やその使者に挑戦できる。まず、裁定局をつまみ出し、それから空にある鋼の惑星に向かって飛び立つ。そこで、偽物の支配者を倒して真の帝国の回復を始める！」

languages.text: « Moi ? Vous n'y êtes pas, nous avons besoin les uns des autres ! Ce n'est qu'en unissant nos forces que nous pourrons affronter la Fracture Céleste et ses émissaires. D'abord, on élimine les représentants de l'Arbites, et ensuite, on assiège l'étoile d'acier en orbite dans le ciel. Une fois sur place, nous abattrons les usurpateurs et nous entamerons la restauration du véritable Imperium ! »
languages.original_text: "Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: « Moi ? Vous n'y êtes pas, nous avons besoin les uns des autres ! Ce n'est qu'en unissant nos forces que nous pourrons affronter la Fracture Céleste et ses émissaires. D'abord, on élimine les représentants de l'Arbites, et ensuite, on assiège l'étoile d'acier en orbite dans le ciel. Une fois sur place, nous abattrons les usurpateurs et nous entamerons la restauration du véritable Imperium ! »

languages.text: "Benim mi? Hayır, bizim birbirimize ihtiyacımız var. Çatlak Gök'ü ve elçilerini ancak birlikte alt edebiliriz. Önce Yargıcıların işini bitireceğiz, sonra da gökteki çelik yıldıza uçacağız. Orada sahte hükümdarları alaşağı edip gerçek İmparatorluk'u yeniden kurmaya başlayacağız!"
languages.original_text: "Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: "Benim mi? Hayır, bizim birbirimize ihtiyacımız var. Çatlak Gök'ü ve elçilerini ancak birlikte alt edebiliriz. Önce Yargıcıların işini bitireceğiz, sonra da gökteki çelik yıldıza uçacağız. Orada sahte hükümdarları alaşağı edip gerçek İmparatorluk'u yeniden kurmaya başlayacağız!"

languages.text: "Ich? Nein, nein, wir brauchen einander! Nur gemeinsam können wir dem Gespaltenen Himmel und seinen Sendboten die Stirn bieten. Zuerst schalten wir die Arbites aus, dann fliegen wir zu dem stählernen Stern am Himmel. Dort stürzen wir die falschen Herrscher und beginnen mit der Wiederherstellung des wahren Imperiums!"
languages.original_text: "Me? No, no, we need each other! Only together can we take on the Riven Sky and its emissaries. First we take out the Arbites, then we fly to the steel star in the sky. There, we will strike down the false rulers and begin our restoration of the true Imperium!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich? Nein, nein, wir brauchen einander! Nur gemeinsam können wir dem Gespaltenen Himmel und seinen Sendboten die Stirn bieten. Zuerst schalten wir die Arbites aus, dann fliegen wir zu dem stählernen Stern am Himmel. Dort stürzen wir die falschen Herrscher und beginnen mit der Wiederherstellung des wahren Imperiums!"
